remarks: Zorn's Lemma of [Monk1] p. 117.  This version of ~ zorn2 avoids the Axiom of Choice by assuming that ` A ` is well-orderable.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Apr-1997.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-May-2015.)
statement:
zorn2g $p |- ( ( A e. dom card /\ R Po A /\ A. w ( ( w C_ A /\ R Or w ) -> E. x e. A A. z e. w ( z R x \/ z = x ) ) ) -> E. x e. A A. y e. A -. x R y ) $.
$d A w x y z $.
$d R w x y z $.
